news.headline: AMZN Q1 Earnings Call: Cloud, Retail, and AI Initiatives Highlight Mixed Segment Results
news.summary: Cloud computing and online retail behemoth Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) met Wall Street’s revenue expectations in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 8.6% year on year to $155.7 billion. news.headline: Buy, Sell, or Hold These Mag 7 Stocks After Earnings: AAPL, AMZN
news.summary: Markets haven't kept the momentum investors were hoping for after receiving much-anticipated quarterly results from Amazon (AMZN) and Apple (AAPL) last Thursday.
